$accountSql
 

Initial value:

"select distinct pcm_val::text,pcm_lib from 
            tmp_pcmn 
            where pcm_val like '".$banque->p_value."%' or pcm_val like '".$vir_interne->p_value."%' 
            or pcm_val like '".$caisse->p_value."%'
            order by pcm_val::text"
